Senior Korean officials meet Vietnamese ambassador
      Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- Premier of the cabinet of the DPRK  Hong Song Nam and Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun met and conversed with Le Xuan Vinh, ambassador of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam to the DPRK who paid a farewell call  on them at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.
